front.title: X.509 Extended Key Usage (EKU) for configuration, updates and safety-communication

abstract.t: RFC 5280 defines the Extended Key Usage (EKU) extension and several extended key purposes (KeyPurposeIds) for use with that extension in X.509 certificates. This document defines KeyPurposeIds for general- purpose and trust anchor configuration files, for software and firmware update packages, and for safety-critical communication to be included in the EKU extension of X.509 v3 public key certificates.
